trans-unit.source: The form window manager interface provides the createFormWindow() function that enables you to create a new form window which you can add to the collection of form windows that the manager maintains, using the addFormWindow() slot. It also provides the formWindowCount() function returning the number of form windows currently under the manager's control, the formWindow() function returning the form window associated with a given index, and the activeFormWindow() function returning the currently selected form window. The removeFormWindow() slot allows you to reduce the number of form windows the manager must maintain, and the setActiveFormWindow() slot allows you to change the form window focus in
trans-unit.target: 表单窗口管理器界面提供了createFormWindow（）函数，该函数使您可以创建一个新的表单窗口，您可以使用addFormWindow（）插槽将其添加到管理器维护的表单窗口集合中。它还提供了formWindowCount（）函数，该函数返回当前在管理者控制下的表单窗口的数量，formWindow（）函数返回与给定索引关联的表单窗口，而activeFormWindow（）函数返回当前选择的表单窗口。该removeFormWindow（）插槽可让您减少的形式窗口管理器必须保持数量和setActiveFormWindow（）插槽可让您更改表单窗口的焦点

trans-unit.source: The form's top level layout can be set by clearing the selection (click the left mouse button on the form itself) and applying a layout. trans-unit.source: The format can be either a semicolon-separated list of scale factors in the same order as QGuiApplication::screens(), or a semicolon-separated list of name=value pairs, where name is the same as QScreen::name().
trans-unit.target: 格式可以是与QGuiApplication :: screens（）相同顺序的以分号分隔的比例因子列表，也可以是 name=value 对的以分号分隔的列表，其中 name 与QScreen :: name（）相同。

trans-unit.source: The format can either be a semicolon-separated list of scale factors in the same order as QGuiApplication::screens(), or a semicolon-separated list of name=value pairs, where name is the same as QScreen::name().

The format determines properties such as color depth, alpha, depth and stencil buffer size, etc. For example, to give a window a transparent background (provided that the window system supports compositing, and provided that other content in the window does not make it opaque again):
trans-unit.target: 格式决定了颜色深度、alpha、深度和模板缓冲区大小等属性。例如,给一个窗口一个透明的背景(前提是窗口系统支持合成,前提是窗口中的其他内容不会再使其不透明)。

trans-unit.source: The format doesn't have to be the same as the referenced texture's format. It however has to be compatible (matching in size but not necessarily by class type). For instance a texture of format R32F (size 32bits, class 1x32) could be used with an image of format RGBA8I (size 32bits, class 4x8). Table 8.27 of the OpenGL specifications shows the size and class for all supported Image formats.

The format doesn't have to be the same as the referenced texture's format. It however has to be compatible (matching in size but not necessarily by class type). For instance a texture of format R32F (size 32bits, class 1x32) could be used with an image of format RGBA8I (size 32bits, class 4x8). Table 8.27 of the OpenGL specifications shows the size and class for all supported image formats.

The format for the displacement map is similar to the tangent space normal maps, which can be created with most 3D-modeling tools. Many image processing tools include the support for generating normal maps. Alternatively, the displacement map for this effect can also be a QML element which is colored appropriately. Like any QML element, it can be animated. It is recommended that the size of the diplacement map matches the size of the source.
trans-unit.target: 位移图的格式类似于切线法线贴图，可以使用大多数3D建模工具来创建。许多图像处理工具都包含生成法线贴图的支持。替代地，用于该效果的位移图也可以是被适当着色的QML元素。像任何QML元素一样，它可以动画化。建议置换图的大小与源的大小匹配。

trans-unit.source: The format in which the days of the week (in the header) are displayed.

trans-unit.source: The format includes the size of the color buffers, red, green, and blue; the size of the alpha buffer; the size of the depth and stencil buffers; and number of samples per pixel for multisampling. In addition, the format contains surface configuration parameters such as OpenGL profile and version for rendering, whether or not to enable stereo buffers, and swap behaviour.
trans-unit.target: 格式包括颜色缓冲区的大小（红色，绿色和蓝色）。alpha缓冲区的大小；深度和模板缓冲区的大小；以及用于多采样的每个像素的采样数。此外，该格式包含表面配置参数，例如OpenGL配置文件和用于渲染的版本，是否启用立体声缓冲区以及交换行为。

trans-unit.source: The format includes the size of the color buffers, red, green, and blue; the size of the alpha buffer; the size of the depth and stencil buffers; and number of samples per pixel for multisampling. trans-unit.source: The fragment shader must contain a function called MAIN. The final fragment color is determined by FRAGCOLOR. The main input texture, with the contents of the View3D's scene, is accessible under a sampler2D with the name INPUT. The UV coordinates from the quad are in INPUT_UV. These UV values are always suitable for sampling INPUT, regardless of the underlying graphics API at run time (and so regardless of the Y axis direction in images since the necessary adjustments are applied automatically by Qt Quick 3D). Sampling the texture with our external image is done using TEXTURE_UV. INPUT_UV is not suitable in cross-platform applications since V needs to be flipped to cater for the coordinate system differences mentioned before, using a logic that is different for textures based on images and textures used as render targets. Fortunately this is all taken care of by the engine so the shader need no further logic for this.
The fragment that represents the image can be found by iterating over the fragments in the text block that contains the image.

trans-unit.source: The frame format defines the width() and height() of the frame on the screen. Each frame can have a border() that surrounds its contents with a rectangular box. The border is surrounded by a margin() around the frame, and the contents of the frame are kept separate from the border by the frame's padding(). This scheme is similar to the box model used by Cascading Style Sheets for HTML pages.
trans-unit.target: 框架格式定义屏幕上框架的宽度（）和高度（）。每个框架都可以有一个边框（），用矩形框将其内容包围。边框被框架周围的空白（）包围，并且框架的内容通过边框的padding（）与边框保持分开。此方案类似于级联样式表用于HTML页面的框模型。

trans-unit.source: The frame is stored using a 16-bit RGB format (5-6-5). This is equivalent to QImage::Format_RGB16.
trans-unit.target: 帧以16位RGB格式（5-6-5）存储。这等效于QImage :: Format_RGB16。

trans-unit.source: The frame is stored using a 16-bit linear greyscale format. Little endian.
trans-unit.target: 帧采用16位线性灰度格式存储。小恩迪安。

trans-unit.source: The frame is stored using a 24-bit BGR format (0xBBGGRR).
trans-unit.target: 帧采用24位BGR格式(0xBBGGRR)存储。

trans-unit.target: 帧使用24位RGB格式（8-8-8）存储。这等效于QImage :: Format_RGB888

trans-unit.source: The frame is stored using a 24-bit packed YUV format (8-8-8).
trans-unit.target: 画面采用24位打包的YUV格式(8-8-8)存储。

trans-unit.source: The frame is stored using a 24-bit premultiplied ARGB format (8-5-6-5).
trans-unit.target: 帧采用24位预乘ARGB格式(8-5-6-5)存储。

trans-unit.source: The frame is stored using a 24-bit premultiplied BGRA format (5-6-5-8).
trans-unit.target: 帧采用24位预乘BGRA格式(5-6-5-8)存储。

trans-unit.source: The frame is stored using a 32-bit ABGR format (0xAABBGGRR).
trans-unit.target: 该帧采用32位ABGR格式(0xAABBGGRR)存储。

trans-unit.target: 该帧使用32位ARGB格式（0xAARRGGBB）存储。这等效于QImage :: Format_ARGB32。

trans-unit.target: 该帧使用32位BGR格式(0xBBGGRRff)存储。

trans-unit.target: 该帧使用32位BGRA格式(0xBBGGRRAA)存储。

trans-unit.source: The frame is stored using a device specific camera raw format.
trans-unit.target: 画面使用设备特定的相机原始格式存储。

trans-unit.source: The frame is stored using a packed 32-bit AYUV format (0xAAYYUUVV).
trans-unit.target: 帧采用打包的32位AYUV格式(0xAAYYUUVV)存储。

trans-unit.source: The frame is stored using a packed premultiplied 32-bit AYUV format (0xAAYYUUVV).
trans-unit.target: 帧采用打包预乘32位AYUV格式(0xAAYYUUVV)存储。

trans-unit.source: The frame is stored using a premultiplied 32bit BGRA format.
trans-unit.target: 该帧采用预乘32位BGRA格式存储。

trans-unit.source: The frame is stored using an 8-bit greyscale format.
trans-unit.target: 帧采用8位灰度格式存储。

trans-unit.source: The frame is stored using an 8-bit per component packed YUV format with the U and V planes horizontally sub-sampled (U-Y-V-Y), i.e. two horizontally adjacent pixels are stored as a 32-bit macropixel which has a Y value for each pixel and common U and V values.
trans-unit.target: 帧采用8位每分量打包的YUV格式存储,U-Y-V-Y水平子采样(U-Y-V-Y),即两个水平相邻的像素被存储为一个32位的宏像素,该宏像素的每个像素都有一个Y值,并有共同的U和V值。

trans-unit.source: The frame is stored using an 8-bit per component packed YUV format with the U and V planes horizontally sub-sampled (Y-U-Y-V), i.e. two horizontally adjacent pixels are stored as a 32-bit macropixel which has a Y value for each pixel and common U and V values.
trans-unit.target: 帧采用8位每分量打包的YUV格式存储,U和V平面水平次采样(Y-U-Y-V),即两个水平相邻的像素被存储为一个32位的宏像素,它的每个像素都有一个Y值和共同的U和V值。

trans-unit.source: The frame is stored using an 8-bit per component planar YUV format with the U and V planes horizontally and vertically sub-sampled, i.e. the height and width of the U and V planes are half that of the Y plane.
trans-unit.target: 帧采用8位每分量平面YUV格式存储,U和V平面在水平和垂直方向上分采样,即U和V平面的高度和宽度是Y平面的一半。

trans-unit.source: The frame is stored using an 8-bit per component planar YUV format with the U and V planes horizontally and vertically sub-sampled. This is similar to the Format_YUV420P type, except that the bytes per line of the U and V planes are padded out to the same stride as the Y plane.
trans-unit.target: 该帧使用8位的每分量平面YUV格式存储,U和V平面在水平和垂直方向上进行子采样。这类似于Format_YUV420P类型,除了U和V平面的每行字节被填充到与Y平面相同的步幅。

trans-unit.source: The frame is stored using an 8-bit per component planar YUV format with the U and V planes horizontally and vertically sub-sampled. This is similar to the Format_YUV420P type, except that the lines of the U and V planes are interleaved, i.e. each line of U data is followed by a line of V data creating a single line of the same stride as the Y data.
trans-unit.target: 该帧使用8位每分量的平面YUV格式存储,U和V平面在水平和垂直方向上都有子采样。这类似于Format_YUV420P类型,除了U和V平面的行是交错的,即每一行U数据后面跟着一行V数据,形成与Y数据相同步长的单行。

trans-unit.source: The frame is stored using an 8-bit per component planar YUV format with the U and V planes horizontally sub-sampled, i.e. the width of the U and V planes are half that of the Y plane, and height of U and V planes is the same as Y.

The frame is stored using an 8-bit per component planar YVU format with the V and U planes horizontally and vertically sub-sampled, i.e. the height and width of the V and U planes are half that of the Y plane.
trans-unit.target: 帧采用8位每分量平面YVU格式存储,V和U平面在水平和垂直方向上分采样,即V和U平面的高度和宽度是Y平面的一半。

trans-unit.source: The frame is stored using an 8-bit per component planar YVU format with the V and U planes horizontally and vertically sub-sampled. This is similar to the Format_YV12 type, except that the bytes per line of the V and U planes are padded out to the same stride as the Y plane.
trans-unit.target: 帧使用8位的每分量平面YVU格式存储,V和U平面在水平和垂直方向上进行子采样。这与Format_YV12类型类似,只是V和U平面的每行字节被填充到与Y平面相同的步长。

trans-unit.source: The frame is stored using an 8-bit per component planar YVU format with the V and U planes horizontally and vertically sub-sampled. This is similar to the Format_YV12 type, except that the lines of the V and U planes are interleaved, i.e. each line of V data is followed by a line of U data creating a single line of the same stride as the Y data.
trans-unit.target: 该帧使用8位的每分量平面YVU格式存储,V和U平面在水平和垂直方向上进行子采样。这类似于Format_YV12类型,除了V和U平面的行是交错的,即每一行V数据后面跟着一行U数据,形成与Y数据相同步幅的单行。

trans-unit.source: The frame is stored using an 8-bit per component semi-planar YUV format with a Y plane (Y) followed by a horizontally and vertically sub-sampled, packed UV plane (U-V).
trans-unit.target: 帧采用每分量8位的半平面YUV格式存储,Y平面(Y)之后是一个水平和垂直次采样的打包UV平面(U-V)。

trans-unit.source: The frame is stored using an 8-bit per component semi-planar YUV format with a Y plane (Y) followed by a horizontally and vertically sub-sampled, packed VU plane (V-U).
trans-unit.target: 帧采用每分量8位的半平面YUV格式存储,Y平面(Y)之后是一个水平和垂直次采样的打包VU平面(V-U)。

trans-unit.source: The frame is stored using raw Adobe Digital Negative (DNG) format.
trans-unit.target: 画面使用原始的Adobe数码底片(DNG)格式存储。

trans-unit.source: The frame latency in range 1 - 16. The default value is 0 (disabled). Changes the limit for Present() and triggers a wait for an available swap chain buffer when beginning each frame. For a detailed discussion, see the article linked above.

The framebuffer can also become invalid if the QOpenGLContext that the framebuffer was created within is destroyed and there are no other shared contexts that can take over ownership of the framebuffer.
trans-unit.target: 如果创建帧缓冲的QOpenGLContext被销毁，并且没有其他共享上下文可以接管帧缓冲的所有权，则帧缓冲也可能变为无效。

trans-unit.source: The framebuffer can become invalid if the initialization process fails, the user attaches an invalid buffer to the framebuffer object, or a non-power of two width/height is specified as the texture size if the texture target is GL_TEXTURE_2D. The non-power of two limitation does not apply if the OpenGL version is 2.0 or higher, or if the GL_ARB_texture_non_power_of_two extension is present.
trans-unit.target: 如果初始化过程失败，用户将无效的缓冲区附加到帧缓冲区对象，或者如果纹理目标为 GL_TEXTURE_2D ，则用户将无效的宽度/高度的2幂指定为纹理大小，则帧缓冲区可能变为无效。如果OpenGL版本为2.0或更高版本，或者存在GL_ARB_texture_non_power_of_two扩展名，则不能使用非2幂限制。

trans-unit.source: The framebuffer has two attachments (color, depth-stencil) when multisampling is not in use, and three (color resolve, depth-stencil, multisample color) when sampleCountFlagBits() is greater than VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_1_BIT. Renderers must take this into account, for example when providing clear values.
trans-unit.target: 当不使用多重采样时，帧缓冲区具有两个附件（颜色，深度模板），而当sampleCountFlagBits（）大于 VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_1_BIT 时,帧缓冲器具有三个附件（颜色解析，深度模板，多样本颜色）。渲染器必须考虑到这一点，例如在提供清晰的值时。

trans-unit.source: The general approach to using XQuery to perform queries on non-XML data has been a three step process. In the first step, the data is loaded into a non-XML data model. In the second step, the non-XML data model is serialized as XML and output to XML (text) files. In the final step, an XML tool loads the XML files into a second, XML data model, where the XQueries can be performed. The development cost of implementing this process is often high, and the three step system that results is inefficient because the two data models must be built and maintained separately.

The general approach to using XQuery to perform queries on non-XML data has been a three step process. In the first step, the data is loaded into a non-XML data model. In the second step, the non-XML data model is serialized as XML and output to XML (text) files. In the final step, an XML tool loads the XML files into a second, XML data model, where the XQueries can be performed. The development cost of implementing this process is often high, and the three step system that results is inefficient because the two data models must be built and maintained separately.
trans-unit.target: 使用XQuery对非XML数据进行查询的一般方法是三步走。第一步,数据被加载到一个非XML数据模型中。第二步,将非XML数据模型序列化为XML,并输出到XML(文本)文件。在最后一步,一个XML工具将XML文件加载到第二个XML数据模型中,在这个模型中可以执行XQueries。实现这一过程的开发成本往往很高,而且由于必须分别建立和维护两个数据模型,因此形成的三步系统效率很低。

trans-unit.source: The geographic region displayed in the Map item is referred to as its viewport, and this is defined by the properties center, and zoomLevel. The center property contains a coordinate specifying the center of the viewport, while zoomLevel controls the scale of the map. See each of these properties for further details about their values.
trans-unit.target: “地图”项中显示的地理区域称为其视口，这由属性center和zoomLevel定义。的中心属性包含一个坐标指定视口的中心，而当zoomLevel =控制地图的比例尺。有关这些值的更多详细信息，请参见每个属性。

trans-unit.source: The geometry is identified with unique name, which is used by the engine to distinguish different models. Instances of same custom geometry type with different parameters should specify different unique id. The name can be used with model source to share the same geometry with different models.
The geometry is in relation to the virtualGeometry() of its screen.
trans-unit.target: 几何图形与其屏幕的virtualGeometry()的关系。

trans-unit.source: The geometry is normalized by the font's pointSize, so a larger pointSize will result in smoother, rather than larger, text. pixelSize should not be used.
The geometry is null by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,几何体为空。

trans-unit.source: The geometry node supports two types of materials, the opaqueMaterial and the normal material. The opaqueMaterial is used when the accumulated scene graph opacity at the time of rendering is 1. The primary use case is to special case opaque rendering to avoid an extra operation in the fragment shader can have significant performance impact on embedded graphics chips. The opaque material is optional.
trans-unit.target: 几何节点支持两种类型的材料，opaqueMaterial和普通材料。当渲染时累积的场景图不透明度为1时，将使用opaqueMaterial。主要用例是特殊情况下的不透明渲染，以避免片段着色器中的额外操作会对嵌入式图形芯片产生显着的性能影响。不透明材料是可选的。

trans-unit.source: The geometry of a QSGGeometryNode has changed.
trans-unit.target: QSGGeometryNode的几何已更改。

trans-unit.source: The geometry of the contentItem is determined by the padding. The following example reserves 10px padding between the boundaries of the popup and its content:

trans-unit.source: The geometry of the newly inserted widget will be the same as the widget it replaces. Its visible and collapsed states are also inherited.
trans-unit.target: 新插入的小组件的几何体将与被替换的小组件相同。它的可见和折叠状态也会被继承。

trans-unit.source: The geometry to be rendered with a flat color material requires vertices in attribute location 0 in the QSGGeometry object to render correctly. The QSGGeometry::defaultAttributes_Point2D() returns an attribute set compatible with this material.
trans-unit.target: 要使用纯色材料进行渲染的几何体需要QSGGeometry对象中属性位置0中的顶点才能正确渲染。所述QSGGeometry :: defaultAttributes_Point2D（）返回一个属性集与该材料相容的。

trans-unit.source: The geometry to be rendered with a texture material requires vertices in attribute location 0 and texture coordinates in attribute location 1. The texture coordinate is a 2-dimensional floating-point tuple. The QSGGeometry::defaultAttributes_TexturedPoint2D returns an attribute set compatible with this material.
trans-unit.target: 要使用纹理材料渲染的几何体，在属性位置0需要顶点，在属性位置1需要纹理坐标。纹理坐标是二维浮点元组。该QSGGeometry :: defaultAttributes_TexturedPoint2D返回一个属性集用这种材料兼容。

trans-unit.source: The geometry to be rendered with an opaque texture material requires vertices in attribute location 0 and texture coordinates in attribute location 1. The texture coordinate is a 2-dimensional floating-point tuple. The QSGGeometry::defaultAttributes_TexturedPoint2D returns an attribute set compatible with this material.
trans-unit.target: 用不透明纹理材料渲染的几何需要在属性位置0处具有顶点，在属性位置1处需要纹理坐标。该纹理坐标是二维浮点元组。该QSGGeometry :: defaultAttributes_TexturedPoint2D返回一个属性集用这种材料兼容。

trans-unit.source: The geometry to be rendered with vertex color must have the following layout. Attribute position 0 must contain vertices. Attribute position 1 must contain colors, a tuple of 4 values with RGBA layout. Both floats in the range of 0 to 1 and unsigned bytes in the range 0 to 255 are valid for the color values.
trans-unit.target: 要用顶点颜色渲染的几何体必须有以下布局。属性位置0必须包含顶点。属性位置1必须包含颜色,一个RGBA布局的4个值的元组。颜色值的范围为0到1的浮点数和范围为0到255的无符号字节都是有效的。

trans-unit.source: The geometry, size hint, and size policy affect the item's size and position. Calling setGeometry() will always resize and reposition the item immediately. Normally, this function is called by QGraphicsLayout after the layout has been activated, but it can also be called by the item's user at any time.
trans-unit.target: 几何形状，大小提示和大小策略会影响项目的大小和位置。调用setGeometry（）总是会立即调整项目的大小并重新定位。通常，激活布局后，QGraphicsLayout会调用此函数，但项目的用户也可以随时调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: The gesture had no motion associated with it on a particular axis.
trans-unit.target: 该手势在某一特定轴线上没有与之相关的运动。

trans-unit.source: The gesture has been finished successfully and the appropriate QGesture object will be delivered to the target as a part of a QGestureEvent.
trans-unit.target: 手势已成功完成，并且适当的QGesture对象将作为QGestureEvent的一部分传递到目标。

trans-unit.source: The gesture has been triggered and the appropriate QGesture object will be delivered to the target as a part of a QGestureEvent.
trans-unit.target: 该手势已被触发，并且适当的QGesture对象将作为QGestureEvent的一部分传递到目标。

trans-unit.source: The gesture involved a downward vertical motion.
trans-unit.target: 这个手势涉及一个向下的垂直运动。

trans-unit.source: The gesture involved a horizontal motion to the left.
trans-unit.target: 这个手势涉及到向左的水平运动。

trans-unit.source: The gesture involved a horizontal motion to the right.
trans-unit.target: 这个手势涉及到向右的水平运动。

trans-unit.source: The gesture involved an upward vertical motion.
trans-unit.target: 这个手势涉及到一个向上的垂直运动。

trans-unit.source: The gesture object also includes information on the current set of touchPoints and the dragThreshold.
trans-unit.target: 手势对象还包括有关当前 touchPoints 和 dragThreshold 的信息。

trans-unit.source: The gesture object may be delivered to the target object in a QGestureEvent if the corresponding gesture is active or has just been canceled. Each event that is delivered contains a list of gesture objects, since support for more than one gesture may be enabled for the target object. Due to the way events are handled in Qt, gesture events may be filtered by other objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果相应的手势处于活动状态或刚刚被取消，则可以在QGestureEvent中将手势对象传递给目标对象。传递的每个事件都包含一个手势对象列表，因为可能为目标对象启用了多个手势支持。由于在Qt中处理事件的方式，手势事件可能会被其他对象过滤。

trans-unit.source: The gesture recognizer will only trigger on left mouse button events.
trans-unit.target: 手势识别器只会在鼠标左键事件时触发。

trans-unit.source: The gesture recognizer will only trigger on middle mouse button events.
trans-unit.target: 手势识别器只会在鼠标中间按钮事件时触发。

trans-unit.source: The gesture recognizer will only trigger on right mouse button events.
trans-unit.target: 手势识别器只会在鼠标右键事件时触发。

trans-unit.source: The gesture recognizer will only trigger on touch events. Specifically it will react on single touch points when using a touch screen and dual touch points when using a touchpad.
trans-unit.target: 手势识别器只会在触摸事件时触发。具体来说,当使用触摸屏时,它将对单个触摸点作出反应,而当使用触摸板时,它将对双触摸点作出反应。

trans-unit.source: The gestures are either active or canceled. A list of those that are currently being executed can be obtained using the activeGestures() function. A list of those which were previously active and have been canceled can be accessed using the canceledGestures() function. A gesture might be canceled if the current window loses focus, for example, or because of a timeout, or for other reasons.
trans-unit.target: 手势处于活动状态或已取消。可以使用activeGestures（）函数获取当前正在执行的列表。可以使用canceledGestures（）函数访问以前处于活动状态并已被取消的列表。如果当前窗口失去焦点（例如，由于超时或其他原因），则手势可能会被取消。

trans-unit.source: The glossiness of a surface depends on how smooth or irregular the surface is. A smooth surface will have a more intense light reflection then a rough surface, where the light reflection will be more spread out. In the Default material the material's glossiness is controlled through the roughness property.

The glow is created by blurring the image live using a gaussian blur. Performing blur live is a costly operation. Fullscreen gaussian blur with even a moderate number of samples will only run at 60 fps on highend graphics hardware.
trans-unit.target: 辉光是通过使用高斯模糊对图像进行实时模糊而产生的。实时执行模糊是一项昂贵的操作。即使是中等数量的样本,全屏高斯模糊在高端图形硬件上也只能以60帧的速度运行。

trans-unit.source: The goal of this module is to provide a way to handle different authentication methods present on the Internet.
trans-unit.target: 该模块的目标是提供一种方法来处理互联网上存在的不同认证方法。

trans-unit.source: The grab happens asynchronously and the JavaScript function
trans-unit.target: 抓取是异步发生的,JavaScript函数

trans-unit.source: The grab happens asynchronously and the signal QQuickItemGrabResult::ready() is emitted when the grab has been completed.
trans-unit.target: 抓取异步发生，并且抓取完成后会发出信号QQuickItemGrabResult :: ready（）。

trans-unit.source: The grabWindow() function grabs pixels from the screen, not from the window, i.e. if there is another window partially or entirely over the one you grab, you get pixels from the overlying window, too. The mouse cursor is generally not grabbed.
trans-unit.target: grabWindow()函数是从屏幕上抓取像素,而不是从窗口中抓取像素,也就是说,如果有另一个窗口部分或全部覆盖在你抓取的窗口上,你也会从覆盖的窗口中获取像素。鼠标光标一般不会被抓取。

trans-unit.source: The grabbed position within the scene
trans-unit.target: 场景内的抓取位置

trans-unit.source: The gradient coordinates can be specified in logical coordinates, relative to device coordinates, or relative to object bounding box coordinates. The coordinate mode can be set using the setCoordinateMode() function. The default is LogicalMode, where the gradient coordinates are specified in the same way as the object coordinates. To retrieve the currently set coordinate mode use coordinateMode().
trans-unit.target: 可以使用相对于设备坐标或相对于对象边界框坐标的逻辑坐标来指定梯度坐标。的坐标模式可以用来设定setCoordinateMode（）函数。默认值为LogicalMode，其中以与对象坐标相同的方式指定渐变坐标。要检索当前设置的坐标模式，请使用coordinateMode（）。

trans-unit.source: The granularity is used by boundingRegion() to calculate how fine the bounding region of the item should be. The highest achievable granularity is 1, where boundingRegion() will return the finest outline possible for the respective device (e.g., for a QGraphicsView viewport, this gives you a pixel-perfect bounding region). The lowest possible granularity is 0. The value of
trans-unit.target: boundingRegion（）使用粒度来计算项目的边界区域应有多细。最高可实现的粒度为1，其中boundingRegion（）将返回各个设备可能的最细轮廓（例如，对于QGraphicsView视口，这将为您提供像素完美的边界区域）。可能的最小粒度为0。

trans-unit.source: The graphic commands makes it possible to include images in the documentation. The images can be rendered as separate paragraphs, or within running text.
trans-unit.target: 图形命令使得在文档中包含图像成为可能。图像可以作为单独的段落,也可以在运行的文本中呈现。

trans-unit.source: The graphics anchor provides an API that enables you to query and manipulate the properties an anchor has. When an anchor is added to the layout with QGraphicsAnchorLayout::addAnchor(), a QGraphicsAnchor instance is returned where the properties are initialized to their default values. The properties can then be further changed, and they will be picked up the next time the layout is activated.
trans-unit.target: 图形锚点提供了一个API，使您可以查询和操纵锚点具有的属性。当使用QGraphicsAnchorLayout :: addAnchor（）将锚点添加到布局时，将返回QGraphicsAnchor实例，在该实例中，属性被初始化为其默认值。然后可以进一步更改属性，并在下次激活布局时将其选中。

trans-unit.source: The graphics anchor provides an API that enables you to query and manipulate the properties an anchor has. When an anchor is added to the layout with QGraphicsAnchorLayout::addAnchor(), a QGraphicsAnchor instance is returned where the properties are initialized to their default values. The properties can then be further changed, and they will be picked up the next time the layout is activated.

trans-unit.target: 灰度值使用公式(R*11+G*16+B*5)/32计算;阿尔法通道被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The greediness of the quantifiers is inverted: *, +, ?, {m,n}, etc. become lazy, while their lazy versions (*?, +?, ??, {m,n}?, etc.) become greedy. There is no equivalent for this option in Perl regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 量词的贪婪反转： * ， + ， ? ， {m,n} 等变得懒惰，而它们的惰性版本（ *? ， +? ， ?? ， {m,n}? 等）变得贪婪。Perl正则表达式中没有与此选项等效的选项。

trans-unit.source: The green rectangle has no x,y specified, so its position defaults to (0,0). trans-unit.source: The handle property will be updated once the renderer has created the underlying fence resource. The handle will remain valid as long as it remains in the unsignaled state. Once it has reached the signaled state, it will be destroyed and a new handle will be created. That means that depending on how long it takes for the fence to be signaled, the same handle could be used over several frames.
The handle returned here is database-dependent, you should query the type name of the variant before accessing it.

trans-unit.source: The handler should support being called multiple times for the same purchase. For example, the application execution might by accident be interrupted after saving the purchase information, but before finalizing the transaction. In this case, the handler should verify that the information is already stored in the persistent storage and then finalize the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 该处理程序应支持对同一购买行为进行多次调用。例如,应用程序的执行可能会在保存购买信息后,但在完成交易前意外中断。在这种情况下,处理程序应该验证信息是否已经存储在持久性存储中,然后完成交易。

trans-unit.source: The headers for the QVulkan classes may include vulkan.h with VK_NO_PROTOTYPES enabled. This can cause issues in C++ wrapper headers that rely on the prototypes. Hence in application code it may be necessary to include vulkan.hpp or similar before any of the QVulkan headers.

trans-unit.source: The heartbeat (only helpful for socket connections) will periodically send a message to connected nodes to detect whether the connection was disrupted. Qt Remote Objects will try to reconnect automatically if it detects a dropped connection. This function can help with that detection since the client will only detect that the server is unavailable when it tries to send data.
trans-unit.target: 心跳(仅对套接字连接有帮助)会定期向连接的节点发送消息,以检测连接是否中断。如果Qt Remote Objects检测到连接中断,它将尝试自动重新连接。这个功能可以帮助检测,因为客户端只有在尝试发送数据时才会检测到服务器不可用。

The help engine can contain any number of custom filters. The management of the filters, including adding new filters, changing filter definitions, or removing existing filters, is done through the QHelpFilterEngine class, which can be accessed by the filterEngine() method.

The help engine can contain any number of custom filters. The management of the filters, including adding new filters, changing filter definitions, or removing existing filters, is done through the QHelpFilterEngine class, which can be accessed by the filterEngine() method. This replaces older filter API that is deprecated since Qt 5.13. Please call setUsesFilterEngine() with true to enable the new functionality.
trans-unit.target: 帮助引擎可以包含任意数量的自定义过滤器。筛选器的管理（包括添加新的筛选器，更改筛选器定义或删除现有的筛选器）是通过QHelpFilterEngine类完成的，可以通过filterEngine（）方法进行访问。这将替换从Qt 5.13开始不推荐使用的旧过滤器API。请使用 true 调用setUsesFilterEngine（）以启用新功能。

trans-unit.source: The high definition shader guarantees that every visible texel of the volume texture is sampled when the volume is rendered. The low definition shader renders only a rough approximation of the volume contents, but at a much higher frame rate. The low definition shader does not guarantee every texel of the volume texture is sampled, so there may be flickering if the volume contains distinct thin features.
trans-unit.target: 高清晰度着色器保证在渲染体积纹理时,体积纹理的每一个可见的texel都被采样。低分辨率着色器只渲染体积内容的一个粗略的近似值,但帧率要高得多。低分辨率着色器不能保证对体积纹理的每一个texel都进行采样,所以如果体积包含明显的细小特征,可能会出现闪烁。

trans-unit.source: The higher level QMediaObject derived classes provide the actual multimedia functionality, by internally using a QMediaService. trans-unit.source: The hopCount() function contains, for a received datagram, the remaining hop count limit for the packet. When sending, it contains the hop count limit to be set. Most protocols will leave this value set to the default and let the operating system decide on the best value to be used. Multicasting over IPv4 often uses this field to indicate the scope of the multicast group (link-local, local to an organization or global).
trans-unit.target: hopCount()函数包含,对于接收到的数据报,数据包的剩余跳数限制。当发送时,它包含要设置的跳数限制。大多数协议会将这个值设置为默认值,让操作系统决定使用的最佳值。IPv4上的组播经常使用这个字段来指示组播组的范围(链路本地、某个组织的本地或全局)。

trans-unit.source: The human readable representation of the URL is fetched with toString(). This representation is appropriate for displaying a URL to a user in unencoded form. The encoded form however, as returned by toEncoded(), is for internal use, passing to web servers, mail clients and so on. Both forms are technically correct and represent the same URL unambiguously -- in fact, passing either form to QUrl's constructor or to setUrl() will yield the same QUrl object.
trans-unit.target: URL的人类可读表示是通过toString（）获取的。此表示形式适合于以未编码形式向用户显示URL。但是，由toEncoded（）返回的编码形式仅供内部使用，传递给Web服务器，邮件客户端等。两种形式在技术上都是正确的，并且明确表示相同的URL-实际上，将任何形式传递给QUrl的构造函数或setUrl（）都会产生相同的QUrl对象。

trans-unit.source: The image above shows a ARGB pixel in memory read as an unsigned integer. However, if this pixel was read byte for byte on a little endian system the first byte would be the byte containing the B-channel. The next byte would be the G-channel, then the R-channel and finally the A-channel. This shows that on little endian systems, how each pixel is interpreted is significant for integer formats. This is not the case on big endian systems.
trans-unit.target: 上面的图像显示了内存中的一个ARGB像素被读取为一个无符号整数。然而,如果这个像素是在一个小恩迪安系统上一个字节一个字节的读取,那么第一个字节将是包含B通道的字节,下一个字节将是G通道,然后是R通道,最后是A通道。下一个字节是G通道,然后是R通道,最后是A通道。这表明,在小恩迪安系统中,如何解释每个像素对于整数格式是很重要的。而在大恩迪安系统中,情况就不是这样了。

trans-unit.source: The image description. Some image formats, such as GIF and PNG, allow embedding of text or comments into the image data (e.g., for storing copyright information). It's common that the text is stored in key-value pairs, but some formats store all text in one continuous block. QImageIOHandler returns the text as one QString, where keys and values are separated by a ':', and keys-value pairs are separated by two newlines ( ). For example, "Title: Sunset Author: Jim Smith Sarah Jones ". Formats that store text in a single block can use "Description" as the key.
trans-unit.target: 图片说明。一些图像格式，例如GIF和PNG，允许将文本或注释嵌入到图像数据中（例如，用于存储版权信息）。文本通常以键值对的形式存储，但是某些格式将所有文本存储在一个连续的块中。QImageIOHandler将文本作为一个QString返回，其中键和值之间用'：'分隔，键-值对之间用两条换行符（\ n \ n）分隔。例如，“标题：日落\ n \ n作者：吉姆·史密斯\ n萨拉·琼斯\ n \ n”。将文本存储在单个块中的格式可以使用“描述”作为键。

trans-unit.source: The image files are named using the following convention:
trans-unit.target: 图像文件使用以下惯例命名。

trans-unit.target: 可以在基础目录 images 找到映像文件。

trans-unit.source: The image is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 图像无效。

trans-unit.source: The image is stored using 1-bit per pixel. Bytes are packed with the less significant bit (LSB) first.
trans-unit.target: 图像采用每像素1位的方式存储。字节先用意义不大的位(LSB)打包。

trans-unit.source: The image is stored using 1-bit per pixel. Bytes are packed with the most significant bit (MSB) first.
trans-unit.target: 图像采用每像素1位的方式存储。字节先用最重要的位(MSB)打包。

trans-unit.source: The image is stored using 8-bit indexes into a colormap.
trans-unit.target: 图像使用8位索引存储到一个colormap中。

trans-unit.source: The image is stored using a 16-bit RGB format (4-4-4). The unused bits are always zero.
trans-unit.target: 图像使用16位RGB格式(4-4-4)存储。未使用的位总是零。

trans-unit.source: The image is stored using a 16-bit RGB format (5-5-5). The unused most significant bit is always zero.
trans-unit.target: 图像使用16位RGB格式(5-5-5)存储。未使用的最有意义的位总是零。

trans-unit.source: The image is stored using a 16-bit RGB format (5-6-5).
trans-unit.target: 图像使用16位RGB格式(5-6-5)存储。

trans-unit.source: The image is stored using a 24-bit BGR format. (added in Qt 5.14)
The image is stored using a 24-bit RGB format (6-6-6). The unused most significant bits is always zero.
trans-unit.target: 图像使用24位RGB格式(6-6-6)存储。未使用的最有意义的位总是零。

trans-unit.source: The image is stored using a 24-bit RGB format (8-8-8).
trans-unit.target: 图像采用24位RGB格式(8-8-8)存储。

trans-unit.source: The image is stored using a 32-bit ARGB format (0xAARRGGBB).
trans-unit.target: 图像使用32位ARGB格式(0xAARRGGBB)存储。

trans-unit.source: The image is stored using a 32-bit BGR format (x-10-10-10). (added in Qt 5.4)
trans-unit.target: 图像使用32位BGR格式(x-10-10-10)存储。(在Qt 5.4中添加)

trans-unit.source: The image is stored using a 32-bit RGB format (0xffRRGGBB).
trans-unit.target: 图像使用32位RGB格式(0xffRRGGBB)存储。

trans-unit.source: The image is stored using a 32-bit RGB format (x-10-10-10). (added in Qt 5.4)
trans-unit.target: 图像使用32位RGB格式(x-10-10-10)存储。(在Qt 5.4中添加)

trans-unit.source: The image is stored using a 32-bit byte-ordered RGB(x) format (8-8-8-8). This is the same as the Format_RGBA8888 except alpha must always be 255. (added in Qt 5.2)
trans-unit.target: 图像使用32位字节排序的RGB(x)格式(8-8-8-8)存储。这与 Format_RGBA8888 相同,只是 alpha 必须始终为 255。(在Qt 5.2中添加)

trans-unit.source: The image is stored using a 32-bit byte-ordered RGBA format (8-8-8-8). Unlike ARGB32 this is a byte-ordered format, which means the 32bit encoding differs between big endian and little endian architectures, being respectively (0xRRGGBBAA) and (0xAABBGGRR). The order of the colors is the same on any architecture if read as bytes 0xRR,0xGG,0xBB,0xAA. (added in Qt 5.2)
trans-unit.target: 图像使用32位字节排序的RGBA格式(8-8-8-8)存储。与ARGB32不同的是,这是一种字节排序的格式,这意味着32位编码在大恩迪安和小恩迪安架构之间有所不同,分别是(0xRRGGBBAA)和(0xAABBGGRR)。如果以字节0xRR,0xGG,0xBB,0xAA的方式读取,颜色的顺序在任何架构上都是一样的。(Qt 5.2中加入)

trans-unit.source: The image is stored using a 32-bit premultiplied ABGR format (2-10-10-10). (added in Qt 5.4)
trans-unit.target: 图像使用32位预乘ABGR格式(2-10-10-10)存储。(在Qt 5.4中添加)

trans-unit.source: The image is stored using a 32-bit premultiplied ARGB format (2-10-10-10). (added in Qt 5.4)
trans-unit.target: 图像使用32位预乘ARGB格式(2-10-10-10)存储。(在Qt 5.4中添加)

trans-unit.source: The image is stored using a 64-bit halfword-ordered RGB(x) format (16-16-16-16). This is the same as the Format_RGBA64 except alpha must always be 65535. (added in Qt 5.12)
The image is stored using a 64-bit halfword-ordered RGB(x) format (16-16-16-16). This is the same as the Format_RGBX64 except alpha must always be 65535. (added in Qt 5.12)
trans-unit.target: 图像使用64位半字排序的RGB(x)格式(16-16-16-16)存储。这与 Format_RGBX64 相同,只是 alpha 必须始终为 65535。(在Qt 5.12中添加)

trans-unit.source: The image is stored using a 64-bit halfword-ordered RGBA format (16-16-16-16). (added in Qt 5.12)
trans-unit.target: 图像使用64位半字排序的RGBA格式(16-16-16-16)存储。(在Qt 5.12中添加)

trans-unit.source: The image is stored using a premultiplied 16-bit ARGB format (4-4-4-4).
trans-unit.target: 图像使用预先乘以的16位ARGB格式(4-4-4-4)存储。

trans-unit.source: The image is stored using a premultiplied 24-bit ARGB format (6-6-6-6).
trans-unit.target: 图像采用预乘24位ARGB格式(6-6-6-6)存储。

trans-unit.source: The image is stored using a premultiplied 24-bit ARGB format (8-5-5-5).
trans-unit.target: 图像使用预先乘以的24位ARGB格式(8-5-5-5)存储。

trans-unit.source: The image is stored using a premultiplied 24-bit ARGB format (8-5-6-5).
trans-unit.target: 图像使用预先乘以的24位ARGB格式(8-5-6-5)存储。

trans-unit.source: The image is stored using a premultiplied 32-bit ARGB format (0xAARRGGBB), i.e. the red, green, and blue channels are multiplied by the alpha component divided by 255. (If RR, GG, or BB has a higher value than the alpha channel, the results are undefined.) Certain operations (such as image composition using alpha blending) are faster using premultiplied ARGB32 than with plain ARGB32.
trans-unit.target: 图像使用预乘32位ARGB格式(0xAARRGGBB)存储,即红、绿、蓝通道乘以alpha分量除以255。如果RR、GG或BB的值高于alpha通道,则结果未定义)。某些操作(如使用alpha混合的图像合成)使用预乘ARGB32比使用普通ARGB32更快。

trans-unit.source: The image is stored using a premultiplied 32-bit byte-ordered RGBA format (8-8-8-8). (added in Qt 5.2)
trans-unit.target: 图像使用预乘32位字节排序的RGBA格式(8-8-8-8)存储。(在Qt 5.2中添加)

trans-unit.source: The image is stored using a premultiplied 64-bit halfword-ordered RGBA format (16-16-16-16). (added in Qt 5.12)
trans-unit.target: 图像使用预乘64位半字排序的RGBA格式(16-16-16-16)存储。(在Qt 5.12中添加)

trans-unit.source: The image is stored using an 16-bit grayscale format. (added in Qt 5.13)
trans-unit.target: 图像使用16位灰度格式存储。(在Qt 5.13中添加)

trans-unit.source: The image is stored using an 8-bit alpha only format. (added in Qt 5.5)
trans-unit.target: 图像使用8位的alpha格式存储。(在Qt 5.5中添加)

trans-unit.source: The image is stored using an 8-bit grayscale format. (added in Qt 5.5)
trans-unit.target: 图像使用8位灰度格式存储。(在Qt 5.5中添加)

trans-unit.source: The image name refers to an entry in the application's resource file. The method used to derive this name is described in The Qt Resource System.
trans-unit.target: 映像名称是指应用程序资源文件中的条目。Qt资源系统中介绍了用于派生此名称的方法。

trans-unit.source: The image property accepts a list of Urls or an svg. The actual image that is drawn is determined using the same algorithm as QIcon (i.e) the image is never scaled up but always scaled down if necessary. If a svg is specified, the image is scaled to the size of the contents rectangle.
trans-unit.target: image属性接受Url或 svg 的列表。使用与QIcon相同的算法确定绘制的实际图像（即，图像从不放大，但在必要时始终按比例缩小）。如果指定了 svg ，则图像将缩放为内容矩形的大小。

trans-unit.source: The image property accepts a list of Urls or an svg. The actual image that is drawn is determined using the same algorithm as QIcon (i.e) the image is never scaled up but always scaled down if necessary. If a svg is specified, the image is scaled to the size of the contents rectangle.
The image source for the animation.

trans-unit.source: The image that is loaded by an icon whose width and height are not set depends on the type of icon in use. For theme icons, the closest available size will be chosen. For regular icons, the behavior is the same as the sourceSize property of Image.

trans-unit.source: The image to use as the mask. Areas with non-zero opacity will be considered inside the shape.
trans-unit.target: 要用作遮罩的图像。不透明度不为零的区域将被视为形状内部。

trans-unit.source: The image used to fill the border. The image is cut into nine parts and stretched appropriately if necessary. See Border Image for details.
trans-unit.target: 用于填充边框的图像。图像被切成九部分，并在必要时适当拉伸。有关详细信息，请参见边框图像。

trans-unit.source: The image used to fill the border. The image is cut into nine parts and stretched appropriately if necessary. See Border Image for details.

trans-unit.target: 图像将被捕获到默认系统位置，对于静态图像，通常捕获为QStandardPaths :: writableLocation（QStandardPaths :: PicturesLocation），对于视频将捕获为QStandardPaths :: writableLocation（QStandardPaths :: MoviesLocation）。

trans-unit.target: 处理程序返回的图像数据格式。这可以是QImage :: Format中列出的任何格式。

trans-unit.source: The impatient reader, who right away wants to see a QPushButton and a custom Qt widget (QAxWidget2) run in a .NET GUI application is referred to the example directory of ActiveQt. It contains the result of this walkthrough using both C# and VB.NET, created with Visual Studio .NET (not 2003). Load examples/dotnet/walkthrough/csharp.csproj, examples/dotnet/walkthrough/vb.vbproj or examples/dotnet/wrapper/wrapper.sln into the IDE and run the solution.
trans-unit.target: 心急的读者，谁马上要见一个QPushButton和一个自定义Qt物件（QAxWidget2在.NET GUI应用程序运行）被称为的例子目录ActiveQt可。它包含使用Visual Studio .NET（不是2003）创建的C＃和VB.NET的演练结果。将 examples/dotnet/walkthrough/csharp.csproj ， examples/dotnet/walkthrough/vb.vbproj 或 examples/dotnet/wrapper/wrapper.sln 加载到IDE中并运行解决方案。

trans-unit.source: The impatient reader, who right away wants to see a QPushButton and a custom Qt widget (QAxWidget2) run in a .NET GUI application is referred to the example directory of ActiveQt. It contains the result of this walkthrough using both C# and VB.NET, created with Visual Studio .NET (not 2003). Load examples/dotnet/walkthrough/csharp.csproj, examples/dotnet/walkthrough/vb.vbproj or examples/dotnet/wrapper/wrapper.sln into the IDE and run the solution.

The implementation guarantees to return a valid QUrl, or a default constructed QUrl. If a node has no base URI, as in the case where a comment has no parent, a default constructed QUrl is returned.
trans-unit.target: 该实现保证返回有效的QUrl或默认构造的QUrl。如果节点没有基本URI（如注释中没有父节点的情况），则返回默认构造的QUrl。

trans-unit.source: The implementation is handled in such a way that object slicing is not an issue.
trans-unit.target: 实现方式是这样处理的,对象分片不是问题。

trans-unit.source: The implementation is handled in such a way that object slicing is not an issue. It is not expected that client applications or backend plugins instantiate a QPlaceSearchResult directly, but rather client applications simply convert to search result subclasses and backend plugins only instantiate subclasses.
trans-unit.target: 以这样的方式处理实现，即对象切片不是问题。不应期望客户端应用程序或后端插件直接实例化QPlaceSearchResult，而是客户端应用程序仅转换为搜索结果子类，而后端插件仅实例化子类。

trans-unit.source: The implementation is handled in such a way that object slicing is not an issue. It is not expected that client applications or backend plugins instantiate a QPlaceSearchResult directly, but rather client applications simply convert to search result subclasses and backend plugins only instantiate subclasses.
The implementation must be prepared that a call to this function may be followed by a new call to initSwapChainResources() at a later point.
trans-unit.target: 必须准备好实现，以便在稍后对该函数的调用之后可以再进行对initSwapChainResources（）的新调用。

trans-unit.source: The implementation must be prepared that a call to this function may be followed by an initResources() at a later point.
trans-unit.target: 必须准备好实现，以便稍后在对该函数的调用之后可以使用initResources（）。

trans-unit.source: The implementation must ensure that the parentLayoutItem() of the removed item does not point to this layout, since the item is considered to be removed from the layout hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 实现必须确保已删除项目的parentLayoutItem（）不会指向此布局，因为该项目被视为已从布局层次结构中删除。

trans-unit.source: The implementation must ensure that the instance's state() is set to QModbusDevice::ConnectingState or QModbusDevice::ConnectedState upon success; otherwise QModbusDevice::UnconnectedState. Typically, QModbusDevice::ConnectingState is used when the connection process reports back asynchronously and QModbusDevice::ConnectedState in case of synchronous connect behavior.
trans-unit.target: 实现必须确保成功时将实例的状态（）设置为QModbusDevice :: ConnectingState或QModbusDevice :: ConnectedState；否则QModbusDevice :: UnconnectedState。通常，当连接过程异步上报时使用QModbusDevice :: ConnectingState，而在发生同步连接行为时使用QModbusDevice :: ConnectedState。

trans-unit.source: The implementation must ensure that upon success the instance's state() is set to QCanBusDevice::ConnectedState; otherwise QCanBusDevice::UnconnectedState. setState() must be used to set the new device state.
trans-unit.target: 实现必须确保成功后，实例的状态（）设置为QCanBusDevice :: ConnectedState ; 否则QCanBusDevice :: UnconnectedState。setState（）必须用于设置新设备状态。

trans-unit.source: The implementation of QHash and QMultiHash in Qt 6 got changed from a node based approach to a two stage lookup table. This design allows to keep the memory overhead of a hash instance very small, while at the same time giving good performance.

The implementation of ColorDialog will be a platform color dialog if possible. If that isn't possible, then it will try to instantiate a QColorDialog. If that also isn't possible, then it will fall back to a QML implementation, DefaultColorDialog.qml. In that case you can customize the appearance by editing this file. DefaultColorDialog.qml contains a Rectangle to hold the dialog's contents, because certain embedded systems do not support multiple top-level windows. When the dialog becomes visible, it will automatically be wrapped in a Window if possible, or simply reparented on top of the main window if there can only be one window.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能，ColorDialog的实现将是平台颜色对话框。如果不可能，那么它将尝试实例化QColorDialog。如果那也是不可能的，那么它将退回到QML实现DefaultColorDialog.qml。在这种情况下，您可以通过编辑此文件来自定义外观。 DefaultColorDialog.qml包含一个Rectangle来保存对话框的内容，因为某些嵌入式系统不支持多个顶级窗口。当对话框可见时，如果可能，它将自动包装在一个Window中，如果只有一个窗口，则将其简单地重新置于主窗口的顶部。

The implementation of a QPlaceManagerEngine must ensure that any signals emitted by the reply objects are delayed until the request functions have returned and the application code has a chance to connect those signals to slots. The typical approach is to use QMetaObject::invokeMethod() with a Qt::QueuedConnection to emit the signals.
trans-unit.target: QPlaceManagerEngine的实现必须确保答复对象发出的任何信号都被延迟，直到请求功能返回并且应用程序代码有机会将这些信号连接到插槽。典型的方法是将QMetaObject :: invokeMethod（）与Qt :: QueuedConnection一起使用以发出信号。

trans-unit.source: The indeterminate mode is similar to a BusyIndicator. Both can be used to indicate background activity. The main difference is visual, and that ProgressBar can also present a concrete amount of progress (when it can be determined). Due to the visual difference, indeterminate progress bars and busy indicators fit different places in user interfaces. Typical places for an indeterminate progress bar:

trans-unit.source: The indeterminate mode is similar to a BusyIndicator. Both can be used to indicate background activity. trans-unit.source: The indexes in the cache refer to the number of positions the item is from the first item appended into the cache. That is to say a cache with a capacity of 100, that has had 150 items appended will have a valid index range of 50 to 149. This allows inserting and retrieving items into the cache based on a theoretical infinite list
trans-unit.target: 缓存中的索引指的是该项目距离第一个被添加到缓存中的项目的位置数。也就是说,一个容量为100的缓存,如果添加了150个项目,那么有效的索引范围是50到149。这就允许基于理论上的无限列表来插入和检索项目到缓存中。

The information is stored in the system registry on Windows, and in XML preferences files on macOS. On other Unix systems, in the absence of a standard, INI text files are used. See QSettings documentation for more details.

The information on which clocks types may overflow and how to remedy that issue is documented along with the clock types.

trans-unit.source: The information within a document can be accessed via two complementary interfaces: A cursor-based interface is used for editing, and a read-only hierarchical interface provides a high level overview of the document structure. The main advantage of the cursor-based interface is that the text can be edited using operations that mimic a user's interaction with an editor, without losing the underlying structure of the document. The read-only hierarchical interface is most useful when performing operations such as searching and document export.
trans-unit.target: 一个文档中的信息可以通过两个互补的界面来访问。基于光标的界面用于编辑,而只读的分层界面则提供文件结构的高层概览。基于光标的界面的主要优点是,可以使用模拟用户与编辑器交互的操作来编辑文本,而不会丢失文档的基本结构。在执行搜索和文档导出等操作时,只读层次界面是最有用的。

trans-unit.source: The informative text that provides a fuller description for the message.
trans-unit.target: 翔实的文字,对信息进行了更充分的描述。

trans-unit.source: The initial camera state, with camera not loaded. The camera capabilities, except supported capture modes, are unknown. While the supported settings are unknown in this state, it's allowed to set the camera capture settings like codec, resolution, or frame rate.

The initial camera state, with the camera not loaded. The camera capabilities (with the exception of supported capture modes) are unknown. This state saves the most power, but takes the longest time to be ready for capture.

trans-unit.source: The initial camera state, with the camera not loaded. The camera capabilities (with the exception of supported capture modes) are unknown. This state saves the most power, but takes the longest time to be ready for capture. While the supported settings are unknown in this state, you can still set the camera capture settings like codec, resolution, or frame rate.
The initial camera status, with camera not loaded. The camera capabilities including supported capture settings may be unknown.

trans-unit.source: The initial distribution of size between the widgets is determined by multiplying the initial size with the stretch factor. You can also use setSizes() to set the sizes of all the widgets. The function sizes() returns the sizes set by the user. Alternatively, you can save and restore the sizes of the widgets from a QByteArray using saveState() and restoreState() respectively.
trans-unit.target: 小部件之间大小的初始分布是通过将初始大小乘以拉伸因子来确定的。您还可以使用setSizes（）设置所有小部件的大小。函数size（）返回用户设置的大小。另外，您可以分别使用saveState（）和restoreState（）从QByteArray保存和恢复小部件的大小。

trans-unit.source: The input context is used by the keyboard as well as concrete input methods. InputContext is a singleton instance hosted by QML. An application should not directly interact with the input context.

trans-unit.target: 输入引擎负责将输入事件路由到输入方法。实际的输入逻辑是由输入方法来实现的。

trans-unit.source: The input engine object is owned by InputContext. Like the InputContext, there is only one instance of the QVirtualKeyboardInputEngine. The input engine contains API functions which the keyboard uses to map user interactions, such as key press and release events, to the input method.
trans-unit.target: 输入引擎对象归InputContext拥有。像InputContext一样，只有QVirtualKeyboardInputEngine的一个实例。输入引擎包含API函数，键盘使用这些函数将用户交互（例如按键和释放事件）映射到输入方法。

trans-unit.source: The input engine.
trans-unit.target: 输入引擎。

trans-unit.source: The input framework makes it easy to write custom input methods or to integrate 3rd party input engines. The input methods can be implemented in C++ or QML.
trans-unit.target: 输入框架可以很容易地编写自定义的输入方法或集成第三方输入引擎。输入方法可以用C++或QML实现。

trans-unit.source: The input framework provides the following main interfaces:

trans-unit.source: The input mask is an input template string. It can contain the following elements:

The input method can collect as many traces as it sees fit and it can begin processing them when necessary. The processing can even be performed in parallel while sampling the data, although it is not recommended because of the potential performance issues. The recommended way is to start processing in a background thread after a suitable delay from the last input, so that the processing does not affect negatively to the user interface.
trans-unit.target: 输入法可以收集它认为合适的痕迹,它可以在必要时开始处理这些痕迹。甚至可以在对数据进行采样的同时进行并行处理,不过由于潜在的性能问题,不建议这样做。推荐的方法是在距离最后一次输入有适当的延迟后,在后台线程中开始处理,这样处理不会对用户界面产生负面影响。

trans-unit.source: The input method can either be set separately for each keyboard layout, or commonly at this context. If set separately, then this property should not be modified.
trans-unit.target: 输入法可以为每个键盘布局单独设置,也可以在此上下文中共同设置。如果单独设置,那么这个属性就不应该被修改。

trans-unit.source: The input method does not participate in the actual collection of trace data. However, the input method has full control over the input since it can either accept or reject a QVirtualKeyboardTrace (e.g. if there are too many instances to handle). This also allows for precise control over how many fingers can be used simultaneously.
trans-unit.target: 输入方法不参与跟踪数据的实际收集。但是，输入法可以完全接受输入，因为它可以接受或拒绝QVirtualKeyboardTrace（例如，要处理的实例过多）。这也允许精确控制可以同时使用多少个手指。

trans-unit.target: 当选择列表的内容发生变化时,输入法发出该信号。在输入法中,当选择列表的内容发生变化时,输入法会发出这个信号。

trans-unit.source: The input method instance can be created in various ways, depending on the use case:
trans-unit.target: 输入方法实例可以根据使用情况以多种方式创建。

trans-unit.source: The input method is a concrete implementation of the keypress handler. It's main function is to handle keypress events and maintain state information for the user input. It interacts with the text editor through QVirtualKeyboardInputContext via pre-edit text or key events.
trans-unit.target: 输入法是按键处理程序的具体实现。它的主要功能是处理按键事件并维护状态信息以供用户输入。它通过预编辑文本或键事件通过QVirtualKeyboardInputContext与文本编辑器进行交互。

trans-unit.source: The input method may request the input engine to update the selection lists at any time by emitting selectionListsChanged() signal. This signal will trigger a call to this method, allowing the input method to update the selection list types.
trans-unit.target: 输入方法可以通过发出selectionListsChanged（）信号随时请求输入引擎更新选择列表。该信号将触发对此方法的调用，从而允许输入方法更新选择列表类型。

trans-unit.source: The input method may request the input engine to update the selection lists at any time by emitting selectionListsChanged() signal. This signal will trigger a call to this method, allowing the input method to update the selection list types.

trans-unit.source: The input method must implement QVirtualKeyboardAbstractInputMethod (C++) or InputMethod (QML) interface and the plugin must register it as a QML type in {QVirtualKeyboardExtensionPlugin::registerTypes} method.
trans-unit.target: 输入方法必须实现QVirtualKeyboardAbstractInputMethod（C ++）或InputMethod（QML）接口，并且插件必须在{ QVirtualKeyboardExtensionPlugin :: registerTypes }方法中将其注册为QML类型。

trans-unit.source: The input method object created by this function can outlive keyboard layout transitions in certain cases. In particular, this applies to the transitions between the layouts listed in the sharedLayouts property.

trans-unit.source: The input method processes the data and discards the object when it is no longer needed.

trans-unit.source: The input method should not show the characters while typing. This is automatically set when setting QLineEdit::echoMode to Password. Note that setting ImhHiddenText does not change the echo mode.

trans-unit.source: The input method should not try to automatically switch to upper case when a sentence ends.
trans-unit.target: 当一句话结束时,输入法不应该尝试自动切换为大写。

trans-unit.source: The input should be opaque or unpremultiplied.

The input stream ended before a well-formed XML document was parsed. Recovery from this error is possible if more XML arrives in the stream, either by calling addData() or by waiting for it to arrive on the device().

trans-unit.source: The instance of QHelpFilterSettingsWidget may be a part of a preferences dialog. Before showing the dialog, setAvailableComponents() and setAvailableVersions() should be called, otherwise the filter settings widget will only offer a creation of empty filters, which wouldn't be useful. In addition, readSettings should also be called to fill up the filter settings widget with the list of filters already stored in the filter engine. The creation of new filters, modifications to existing filters and removal of unneeded filters are handled by the widget automatically. If you want to store the current state of the widget and apply it to the filter engine e.g. after the user clicked the apply button - call applySettings().
The instance of QRadioData is already bound to this instance of QRadioTuner.
